parameter.label: Unreachable
parameter.description: Set to "true" when the device is unreachable.

parameter.label: Sticky unreachable
parameter.description: Set to "true" when the device is unreachable. It stays "true" until reset manually.

parameter.label: RSSI
parameter.description: The RSSI of the device in dBm. It is not set for Philips hue lamps.

parameter.label: Peer ID
parameter.description: The ID of the peer. This variable is only needed for compatability reasons.

parameter.label: State
parameter.description: Switches the light on using the last settings or off.

parameter.label: Brightness
parameter.description: Sets the brightness and switches "COLOR_MODE" to HSV.

parameter.label: Hue
parameter.description: Sets the hue and switches "COLOR_MODE" to HSV.

parameter.label: Saturation
parameter.description: The saturation of the current color. Switches "COLOR_MODE" to HSV ("hs").

parameter.label: Color temperature
parameter.description: Switches "COLOR_MODE" to white ("ct"). Sets the temperature of the white light.

parameter.label: Color mode
parameter.description: The currently selected color mode. "ct" => white, "hs" => HSV, "effects" => animation.

parameter.label: Effect
parameter.description: Shows the currently selected effect or sets it.

parameter.label: Effect list
parameter.description: Array with all installed effect names. These names can be used to set "EFFECT".

parameter.label: Effect JSON
parameter.description: You can place raw JSON effect commands here. E. g.: {"write":{"command": "add", "animName": "bla", "animType": "static", "animData": "5 15 1 255 0 0 0 1 169 1 0 255 0 0 1 121 1 0 0 255 0 1 186 1 255 0 255 0 1 221 1 255 255 0 0 1", "loop" : false}}. See http://forum.nanoleaf.me/docs/openapi for more information.

parameter.label: Panel layout
parameter.description: Returns a structure with the current panel layout.
